= Introduction =

Basic 5V servo test

Setup:
TowerPro micro servo,
Arduino Uno R3


= Details =

* Connect servo to 5V pin(red servo cable)
* Connect servo to GND pin(brown servo cable)
* Connect third cable to PWM(~) adruino output
